name: Regional Health Properties, Inc.
description: Regional Health Properties, Inc. is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in the ownership, lease, and management of healthcare-related properties, primarily skilled nursing facilities and assisted living facilities. Founded in 2012, RHE focuses on acquiring and managing properties that are essential to providing quality healthcare services. The company aims to enhance the operational efficiencies of its facilities while ensuring the highest level of care for residents. With a portfolio that includes properties across various states, Regional Health Properties is committed to improving the health and well-being of the communities it serves. The company partners with experienced operators to manage its facilities, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and enhancing the quality of life for residents. As the demand for healthcare services continues to grow, RHE is strategically positioned to capitalize on opportunities within the healthcare real estate sector, aiming to deliver sustainable returns to its shareholders while fulfilling its mission of providing quality healthcare environments.

seo.meta_title: Regional Health Properties, Inc. | Healthcare Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Regional Health Properties, Inc., a REIT focused on healthcare properties. Learn about our commitment to quality care and real estate investments.

faq.question: What does Regional Health Properties do?
faq.answer: Regional Health Properties is a REIT that owns and manages healthcare-related properties, mainly skilled nursing and assisted living facilities.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Regional Health Properties?
faq.answer: L. Scott McCulloch is the CEO of Regional Health Properties, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Regional Health Properties headquartered?
faq.answer: Regional Health Properties is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.

faq.question: What type of properties does RHE manage?
faq.answer: RHE primarily manages skilled nursing facilities and assisted living facilities.

faq.question: When was Regional Health Properties founded?
faq.answer: Regional Health Properties was founded in 2012.
